text: An intelligence agency is currently hosting a learning and training portal in AWS. Your manager instructed you to launch a large EC2 instance with an attached EBS Volume and enable Enhanced Networking. What are the valid case scenarios in using Enhanced Networking?

answers.text: When you need a dedicated connection to your on-premises data center
When you need a higher packet per second (PPS) performance
When you need a consistently lower inter-instance latencies
When you need a low packet-per-second performance
When you need high latency networking
